channel.title: The Uchiha
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "The Uchiha" - Anyone want to ally?

item.title: The Uchiha
item.content:encoded: So i was wondering if anyone would like to ally with us(The Uchiha). you can pm giffica/britzer/tsunade in the game or e-mail me at moc.oohay|reztiR.nimajneB#moc.oohay|reztiR.nimajneB. what ever is more comfortable to you. We are new and have many Allies already. We also have a alliance if you would like to join. Search AoB and look at the page.
